BLOCK_EXPLOSION.description: Damage caused by being in the area when a block explodes.

CONTACT.description:
Damage caused when an entity contacts a block such as a Cactus,
 Dripstone (Stalagmite) or Berry Bush.

CRAMMING.description:
Damage caused when an entity is colliding with too many entities due
 to the maxEntityCramming game rule.

DRAGON_BREATH.description: Damage caused by a dragon breathing fire.

DROWNING.description: Damage caused by running out of air while in water

DRYOUT.description: Damage caused when an entity that should be in water is not.

ENTITY_ATTACK.description: Damage caused when an entity attacks another entity.

ENTITY_EXPLOSION.description:
Damage caused by being in the area when an entity, such as a
 Creeper, explodes.

ENTITY_SWEEP_ATTACK.description: Damage caused when an entity attacks another entity in a sweep attack.

FALL.description: Damage caused when an entity falls a distance greater than 3 blocks

FALLING_BLOCK.description: Damage caused by being hit by a falling block which deals damage

FIRE.description: Damage caused by direct exposure to fire

FIRE_TICK.description: Damage caused due to burns caused by fire

FLY_INTO_WALL.description: Damage caused when an entity runs into a wall.

HOT_FLOOR.description: Damage caused when an entity steps on Material.MAGMA_BLOCK.

LAVA.description: Damage caused by direct exposure to lava

LIGHTNING.description: Damage caused by being struck by lightning

MAGIC.description: Damage caused by being hit by a damage potion or spell

MELTING.description: Damage caused due to a snowman melting

POISON.description: Damage caused due to an ongoing poison effect

PROJECTILE.description: Damage caused when attacked by a projectile.

SONIC_BOOM.description: Damage caused by the Sonic Boom attack from Warden

STARVATION.description: Damage caused by starving due to having an empty hunger bar

SUFFOCATION.description: Damage caused by being put in a block

THORNS.description:
Damage caused in retaliation to another attack by the Thorns
 enchantment.

VOID.description: Damage caused by falling into the void

WITHER.description: Damage caused by Wither potion effect
